articles.title: Donald Trump gave Interior nominee directive for US land: ‘Drill.’
articles.description: Donald Trump assigned Doug Burgum a singular mission in nominating the governor of oil-rich North Dakota to lead an agency that oversees a half-billion acres of federal land and vast areas offshore: “Drill baby drill.”
articles.content:
BISMARCK, N.D. — Donald Trump assigned Doug Burgum a singular mission in nominating the governor of oil-rich North Dakota to lead an agency that oversees a half-billion acres of federal land and vast areas offshore: “Drill baby drill.”

articles.description: Homan, who was named Donald Trump's "border czar," has set his sights on sanctuary cities like Los Angeles.
articles.content:
Tom Homan, Donald Trump's incoming "border czar," has vowed to send "twice as many" Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agents to Los Angeles to enact mass deportations.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Scott Bessent: Trump's Potential Pick for Treasury Secretary
articles.description: Donald Trump is considering naming Scott Bessent, a seasoned hedge fund investor, as his treasury secretary. Known for advocating tax reform and deregulation, Bessent has outlined plans to boost bank lending and energy production, aligning with Trump's economic strategies.
articles.content:
Donald Trump, the U.S. President-elect, is reportedly poised to appoint Scott Bessent as his treasury secretary. Bessent is a prominent hedge fund investor and former Yale University educator.
